A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Not as bad as I have heard. I was really surprised that TLJ had some totally unpredictable scenes. While not perfect\, still a solid piece of the SW story. Fans are really nitpicking it. 
 
Spoilers: Leia flying through space was a bit corny\, but that's what happens in movies. Luke had a believable exit.  Kylo is so immature and full of hubris\, and I'm surprised he's still around honestly. His General is likely going to mess up his life in the next installment\, as they HATE 
each other.
